pr_title: ensure focus set on file.edit call

timeline.message: ensure focus set on file.edit call

timeline.bodyText: I don't get this part of the change -- it looks like this was the only place where we read the focusOnNavigate flag. Is the flag still necessary?
timeline.author: jmcphers

replies.bodyText: It is -- I removed that code unintentionally. What's the brain equivalent of a typo?
replies.author: kevinushey
